item.title: Rs2 Map Editor won't start up
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

Okay, so I’m trying to edit my maps with the map editor but i can’t get it to run when i open it it say ‘’ ‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. ‘’ as soon as i open the program it exits out i only know what it says because i opened it and quickly did print screen, here’s what it says in the batch file…

@echo off
title RS2 Map editor
java -cp stdJ3d.jar;maped.jar -Xmx512m MapEditor

any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: Rs2 Map Editor won't start up
